title: DaoPay Missing from South Africa payment method
body: Hi every one n Riot, i brought some RP just a few days ago, n when i was about to buy more RP then i find out that daopay is missing from the payment method and all the currency is changed to â‚¬. so i would like to know if this is a tech issue or this is how it's gonna be for rest of the time.

replies.body: We'd like to look into this and help out with your specific issue!  Reach out to us in a[ support ticket](http://ticket), and our billing team can help find some options for you.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as possible!
